title: Refactor analysis screens into shared analysis view model
description: Extract common streaming logic from BarcodeAnalysisViewModel and LabelAnalysisViewModel into a reusable analysis module that handles PostHog events, feedback, and input selection.

title: Stabilize Barcode/Label analysis view models
description: Promote the analysis view models to @StateObject (or equivalent Observable initialization) so .task(id:) can trigger analyze() without recreating view models and duplicating streamed requests.

title: Modernize product image carousel
description: Switch ProductImagesView to geometry-driven sizing and replace manual index math with ForEach(images.indices) plus an async image loader to avoid repeated fetches and better support iPad split view.

title: Deduplicate ingredient badge popovers
description: Extract the repeated popover styling in TappableTextFragment into a dedicated IngredientBadge view so maybeUnsafe/definitelyUnsafe cases share one code path.

title: Rework ImageCaptureView camera lifecycle
description: Move conditionalNavigationBarTitle into a modifier, convert toolbar buttons to .toolbar, and lift CameraManager into an Observable @StateObject so session state persists without clearing captured images on disappear.
